decimals().notice: Returns the precision of the feed.

latestRoundData().notice: Returns Chainlink's `latestRoundData` return values.Only the `answer` field is used by `MorphoChainlinkOracleV2`.

devdoc.details: Inspired by https://github.com/smartcontractkit/chainlink/blob/master/contracts/src/v0.8/shared/interfaces/AggregatorV3Interface.solThis is the minimal feed interface required by `MorphoChainlinkOracleV2`.

decimals().notice: Returns the precision of the feed.

latestRoundData().notice: Returns Chainlink's `latestRoundData` return values.Only the `answer` field is used by `MorphoChainlinkOracleV2`.
